column4: hi, i'd like to set up ubntu as a web server on an old machine (p2-266 192mb 6gb hdd) will it work ok?
try and see.  Use the "server" install option.
I'm trying to save the time on try and error...
there's no reason I can think of that it wouldn't run on that caliber of system in general, but your system may or may not have issues with particular hardware.
